title: Jigx
content:
My thanks to Jigx for sponsoring last week at DF. Jigx empowers anyone with basic development and SQL skills to build native iOS apps. Not squashed websites in a native container. But powerful, pixel-perfect mobile apps that run natively on iOS and iPadOS. Serious well-crafted apps that you can be proud of, and that people love to use.

Use Jigx to solve all kinds of business problems or build that killer business app on your bucket list. Jigx does all the heavy lifting so you can go from idea to mobile app faster than ever.

Download the free Jigx Builder and build your first native iOS app today.
